solution_line_template: The bakery has made {total_doughnuts} total doughnuts / {doughnuts_per_box} doughnuts per box = <<{total_doughnuts}/{doughnuts_per_box}={total_boxes_made}>>{total_boxes_made} boxes of doughnuts.

So at the end of the day, they still have {total_boxes_made} total boxes of doughnuts - {boxes_sold} sold boxes of doughnuts = <<{total_boxes_made}-{boxes_sold}={boxes_leftover}>>{boxes_leftover} boxes of doughnuts leftover.

They are therefore giving away {boxes_leftover} boxes of doughnuts * {doughnuts_per_box} doughnuts per box = <<{boxes_leftover}*{doughnuts_per_box}={doughnuts_given_away}>>{doughnuts_given_away} doughnuts.
